item.title: Squeezing & Sharding Cosmos DB
item.description: Recently I've been exploring the cost optimizations that are possible in Cosmos DB, and tripped over some interesting gotchas and side behaviors that I thought were blog worthy. This is mostly a ‘stream of consciousness’ of the various problems I bounced off, but I'm sure I'm not the only that will to go through such a journey Azure Cosmos DB is a great service with some huge features (global scale, low latency, replication, multi-model, multi API, etc).
